data.lyric:
[ti:Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You)]
[ar:Kelly Clarkson]
[al:Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You) - Kelly Clarkson
[00:01.76]
[00:03.72]Out in the cold
[00:06.28]Standin' where the trees meet the road
[00:09.63]This used to be our favorite spot in this town
[00:13.09]Memories with you and me ruin it now
[00:15.93]Woah-woah-woah
[00:17.53]That's where we met
[00:19.97]Like a winter dream in that bed
[00:23.34]I wasn't the first and I won't be the last
[00:26.84]Underneath that mistletoe you've been so bad
[00:29.94]Woah-woah-woah
[00:31.07]
[00:31.95]You ruin all my favorite things
[00:34.69]All my favorite things
[00:37.36]But you won't take Christmas from me
[00:43.68]
[00:44.21]I'll be hanging every light I find in this house
[00:48.26]Playin' Christmas music so loud
[00:51.79]This year Christmas won't be quite so blue
[00:57.24]
[00:57.91]And I'm gonna shout too much and dance in the snow
[01:02.09]Drink just enough to let us go
[01:05.53]Christmas isn't canceled just you
[01:10.49]
[01:12.31]Lost at first
[01:14.93]Thinkin' that I might
[01:16.35]I might
[01:17.06]Be cursed
[01:18.29]Winter Wonderlands weren't made for one
[01:21.19]
[01:21.72]So we've all been told since we were young
[01:24.48]Woah-woah-woah
[01:25.95]
[01:26.86]But I'm not feelin' incomplete
[01:29.46]Feelin' incomplete
[01:32.02]Turns out I don't need a thing underneath my tree
[01:38.39]
[01:39.00]I'll be hanging every light I find in this house
[01:43.18]Playin' Christmas music so loud
[01:46.61]This year Christmas won't be quite so blue
[01:51.76]
[01:52.76]And I'm gonna shout too much and dance in the snow
[01:56.91]Drink just enough to let us go
[02:00.37]Christmas isn't canceled just you
[02:05.42]
[02:07.40]Christmas
[02:08.45]Without you it's still fun
[02:10.63]Christmas
[02:11.60]And when the New Year comes
[02:14.00]Don't you worry 'bout me I'll be alright
[02:17.39]Baby by New Year's night ooh
[02:21.68]I'll be ringin' in the New Year with all my friends
[02:25.96]Kissin' goodbye to what might've been
[02:29.55]This year New Year's I won't be your fool
[02:34.63]
[02:35.65]And I bet you see me out wonderin' what's wrong
[02:39.72]Watchin' me have fun with you gone
[02:43.17]New Year's isn't canceled
[02:45.80]
[02:46.62]Christmas isn't canceled
[02:51.03]
[02:53.12]Just you
[02:53.70]Christmas isn't canceled
[02:56.76]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:00.20]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:03.50]Just you
[03:04.20]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:06.99]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:09.99]
[03:10.50]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:13.70]Just you
[03:14.37]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:16.79]
[03:17.35]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:20.77]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:23.91]Just you
[03:24.51]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:27.15]
[03:27.67]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:31.03]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:34.18]Just you
[03:34.74]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:37.39]
[03:37.92]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:41.41]Christmas isn't canceled
[03:44.46]Just you
[03:44.99]Christmas isn't canceled
data.trans:
[ti:Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You)]
[ar:Kelly Clarkson]
[al:Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.76]
[00:03.72]屋外寒风呼啸
[00:06.28]伫立在绿树成荫的路上
[00:09.63]这曾是我们在镇上最喜爱的地方
[00:13.09]现在我们的过往已消失殆尽
[00:15.93]//
[00:17.53]那里是我们相遇的地方
[00:19.97]我喜欢在那张床榻进入梦乡
[00:23.34]我不是第一个 也不会是最后一个
[00:26.84]在那槲寄生下 你表现得如此糟糕
[00:29.94]//
[00:31.07]
[00:31.95]你亲手毁了我最喜爱的事物
[00:34.69]我喜爱的一切
[00:37.36]但你毁不了我的圣诞节
[00:43.68]
[00:44.21]我会挂起在这座房屋找到的所有圣诞彩灯
[00:48.26]尽情播放圣诞音乐
[00:51.79]今年的圣诞节绝不忧郁
[00:57.24]
[00:57.91]我会放声呐喊 在飘雪中翩翩起舞
[01:02.09]啜饮美酒 直至我将我们忘却
[01:05.53]我还是会过圣诞节 只是没有你在我的身旁
[01:10.49]
[01:12.31]初遇时我被冲昏了头脑
[01:14.93]我想我或许是
[01:16.35]我或许是
[01:17.06]中了爱情魔咒
[01:18.29]冬日仙境不仅是为一人而设
[01:21.19]
[01:21.72]这是我们从小受的教导
[01:24.48]//
[01:25.95]
[01:26.86]但我并不感觉我不完整
[01:29.46]感觉到不完整
[01:32.02]事实证明 我不需要任何礼物
[01:38.39]
[01:39.00]我会挂起在这座房屋找到的所有圣诞彩灯
[01:43.18]尽情播放圣诞音乐
[01:46.61]今年的圣诞节绝不忧郁
[01:51.76]
[01:52.76]我会放声呐喊 在飘雪中翩翩起舞
[01:56.91]啜饮美酒 直至我将我们忘却
[02:00.37]我还是会过圣诞节 只是没有你在我的身旁
[02:05.42]
[02:07.40]圣诞佳节
[02:08.45]没有你的存在 依然有趣
[02:10.63]圣诞佳节
[02:11.60]当新年钟声敲响时
[02:14.00]别担心我 我会安然无恙
[02:17.39]宝贝 在新年的夜晚
[02:21.68]我会与我的朋友们欢笑畅谈 迎接新的一年
[02:25.96]与过去的每种可能说声再见
[02:29.55]新的一年 我不会中你的圈套
[02:34.63]
[02:35.65]我猜 当你看着我时 你就会想
[02:39.72]为何没有我的陪伴 你仍享受欢乐
[02:43.17]新年不会取消 必定来临
[02:45.80]
[02:46.62]圣诞佳节不会取消
[02:51.03]
[02:53.12]消失的只是你罢了
[02:53.70]圣诞佳节不会取消
[02:56.76]圣诞佳节必定来临
[03:00.20]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:03.50]消失的只是你罢了
[03:04.20]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:06.99]圣诞佳节必定来临
[03:09.99]
[03:10.50]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:13.70]消失的只是你罢了
[03:14.37]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:16.79]

[03:20.77]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:23.91]消失的只是你罢了
[03:24.51]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:27.15]
[03:27.67]圣诞佳节必定来临
[03:31.03]圣诞佳节不会取消
[03:34.18]消失的只是你罢了
[03:34.74]圣诞佳节不会取消

[03:37.92]圣诞佳节不会取消
